        public int heal​(MedicalItem m,
                boolean crewHasMedic)
        Heals crew member according to healthRestore attribute of the medical item Crew member health cannot be greater than max
        Parameters:
        m - Medical item used to heal
        crewHasMedic - If a medic is in the crew, 20% more health is restored
        Returns:
        int The amount of health restored

      • newDay

        public boolean newDay​(double healthMod,
                      double tirednessMod,
                      double hungerMod)
        Called at the start of each new day to modify attributes of crew member. Attributes are modified based on values given
        Parameters:
        healthMod - Affects how much health is modified
        tirednessMod - Affects how much tiredness is modified
        hungerMod - Affects how much hunger is modified
        Returns:
        boolean Returns true if crew member is still alive, otherwise false
